name: 尘沙的选择 THE CHOICE OF SAND
description: 2D action shooting, plot rich game. Classic game system, simple weapon and menu operation mode, let you feel the spirit of classic action adventure game, gradually reveal plot development, more choice dialogue, non-compulsory task.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.2Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.2Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color + DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
